attributes.action: Introduce "Wrong Way" markings on the back of motorway and dual carriageway signs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been a number of fatalities caused by drivers heading the wrong way along motorways and dual carriageways. 

Such errors can be caused by inexperience, foreign drivers, poor visibility or often by elderly drivers.

In other parts of the world, road signs have "Wrong Way" marked on the reverse, for just this reason.

The benefit to cost of this change, to be introduced to all new road signs on major UK roads, should be clear in both financial terms and in the loss of life.
